title: Prepare for optimisations.

comments.body:
## [Current coverage][1] is `94.96%`
> Merging **#70** into **master** will decrease coverage by **-0.04%** as of [`ba43e8c`][3]


```diff
@@            master     #70   diff @@
======================================
  Files           12      14     +2
  Stmts          701     715    +14
  Branches        82      86     +4
  Methods                          
======================================
+ Hit            666     679    +13
  Partial          0       0       
- Missed          35      36     +1
```

> Review entire [Coverage Diff][4] as of [`ba43e8c`][3]


-----
### [Uncovered Suggestions][2]

1. `+0.70%` via [...internal/Split.scala#79...83](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/Split.scala?ref=ba43e8c49f53dda7733a637daaeaeae06fbe7b27#79) 
1. `+0.28%` via [...lafmt/ScalaFmt.scala#47...48](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/ScalaFmt.scala?ref=ba43e8c49f53dda7733a637daaeaeae06fbe7b27#47) 
1. `+0.28%` via [...l/Modification.scala#45...46](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/Modification.scala?ref=ba43e8c49f53dda7733a637daaeaeae06fbe7b27#45) 
1. *[See 7 more...][2]*

body:
* use longs as keys instead of tokens with custom hash function.
* IntegrityTest to verify formatter doesn't break code
* WARNING: can't format formatter.scala, deeply nested trees.
* Create Policy and PolicySummary case classes.
* {Format,Diff}Assertions.
